stories.text: I've been working on things and I started thinking. What are some of the craziest possible things that could exist in the state space of all possible 512x512 bitmaps with 256 colors? I already have some ideas, but I'm curious what other people could imagine or what they would be looking for. Aside from terrible things that could exist -- I wonder could there possibly be a correct proof about P=/!=NP?
stories.title: Ask HN: What are possible images you can think of?
Lithuanians Fundraised Bayraktar Drone for Ukraine

stories.text: Hi, I'm a TCS MSc student who was looking for some events (summer schools, conferences, or any type of event related to TCS, logic or math) taking place this summer in Europe. Do you know of some? One that was already recommended to me is ESSLLI, which I was considering to attend, but I could even add a few more. Thanks.
stories.title: Ask HN: Theoretical CS summer schools/events taking place in Europe this year?
